title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C is a versatile programming language used for system development, embedded systems across various domains.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: An algorithm is a step-by-step procedure for solving problems, performing tasks, or making decisions in computer science.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms using C++ for software development.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Fundamental components in computer science, including arrays, stacks, queues, used to organize and manage data.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Explore object-oriented programming concepts for building modular, reusable, and efficient Python applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: The systematic design, development, and maintenance of software solutions and tools to meet user needs effectively.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS offers on-demand cloud resources, enabling businesses to deploy, manage, and scale applications efficiently.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is a open-source database management system, known for its reliability, ease of use in web applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Applying logical thinking and coding skills to solve problems efficiently through algorithmic and creative approaches.
